tasks.title: Circular Progressbar widget
tasks.description: Create a widget that should show completeness of a task in percetange from 1 to 100.

tasks.title: Circular Progressbar not rendered with latest jQuery version
tasks.description: When the Circular ProgressBar is used with the latest jQuery version an error is thrown that leads to the widget not being rendered

tasks.title: Add color options to Circular Progressbar widget
tasks.description: Add color pallete options to the Circular Progressbar widget so that the user can choose a coloring that matches the rest of the appearance of their application.

tasks.title: Grid not exporting the data to Excel
tasks.description: With R1 2022, the grid stopped downloading an xlsx file when the user clicks on the 'Export to Excel' button

tasks.title: Improve Form API reference and TS definitions
tasks.description: Document items.layout and items.grid in the API reference and update the TS file.

tasks.title: Unexpected new line added when click a button (Firefox only)
tasks.description: Only reproducible in Firefox. When any of the Kendo UI buttons is clicked, a new line is added that distorts the view.

tasks.title: Improve low performing MVC articles
tasks.description: There is a list of documentation articles that have very low satisfaction from our customers. We should revamp them.

tasks.title: Telerik Grid has distorted appearance with bootstrap v5
tasks.description: The Telerik UI Grid has appearance issues with the latest version of the bootstrap library.

tasks.title: Wrapper for ColorGradient Component
tasks.description: Add wrapper for the new Kendo UI jQuery ColoGradient widget.

tasks.title: Grid not exporting the data to Excel
tasks.description: With R1 2022, the grid stopped downloading an xlsx file when the user clicks on the 'Export to Excel' button

tasks.title: Deprecate the old MVC extensions
tasks.description: The old MVC extensions are now substituted with the new Telerik UI MVC components. The extensions should be deprecated

tasks.title: Submitting a form in a live demo redirects to a new page
tasks.description: When the form is submitted, the page should be refreshed but the href location should not be alternated.
